mapper.sql: t1.user_id as "userId" ,t1.fax as "fax" ,t1.birthday as "birthday" ,t1.marital_state as "maritalState" ,t1.credential_number as "credentialNumber" ,t1.income as "income" ,t1.inc_verifiable as "incVerifiable" ,t1.other_income as "otherIncome" ,t1.other_income_src as "otherIncomeSrc" ,t1.self_fico as "selfFico" ,t1.cumulative_job_tenure as "cumulativeJobTenure" ,t1.education_level as "educationLevel" ,t1.tax as "tax" ,t1.own_car_num as "ownCarNum" ,t1.own_house_num as "ownHouseNum" ,t1.children_state as "childrenState" ,t1.children_num as "childrenNum" ,t1.asset_other as "assetOther" ,t1.wechat as "wechat" ,t1.qq as "qq" ,t1.work_start_date as "workStartDate" ,t1.domicile_live_diff as "domicileLiveDiff" ,t1.relation as "relation" ,t1.staff_no as "staffNo" ,t1.address as "address" ,t1.mantance_staff_no as "mantanceStaffNo" ,t1.user_sub_type as "userSubType" ,t1.proxy_level as "proxyLevel" ,t1.proxy_user_id as "proxyUserId" ,t1.proxy_chain as "proxyChain" ,t1.lender_state as "lenderState" ,t1.debt_state as "debtState" ,t1.date_lender as "dateLender" ,t1.date_debt as "dateDebt" ,t1.memo as "memo" ,t1.del_flag as "delFlag" ,t1.date_created as "dateCreated" ,t1.date_updated as "dateUpdated" ,t1.bi_update_ts as "biUpdateTs"
mapper.select:
select
from member t1 where t1.user_id = #{userId}

select
from member t1 where 1=1
order by t1.date_created desc

select
from member t1 where 1=1
order by t1.date_created desc
